verses.verse: Now the serpent <WH5175> was <WH1961> <WH8804> more subtil <WH6175> than any beast <WH2416> of the field <WH7704> which the YY <WH3068> 'Elohim <WH430> had made <WH6213> <WH8804>. And he said <WH559> <WH8799> unto the woman <WH802>, Yea <WH637>, hath 'Elohim <WH430> said <WH559> <WH8804>, Ye shall not eat <WH398> <WH8799> of every tree <WH6086> of the garden <WH1588> ?
And the woman <WH802> said <WH559> <WH8799> unto the serpent <WH5175>, We may eat <WH398> <WH8799> of the fruit <WH6529> of the trees <WH6086> of the garden <WH1588>:

But of the fruit <WH6529> of the tree <WH6086> which is in the midst <WH8432> of the garden <WH1588>, 'Elohim <WH430> hath said <WH559> <WH8804>, Ye shall not eat <WH398> <WH8799> of it, neither shall ye touch <WH5060> <WH8799> it, lest <WH6435> ye die <WH4191> <WH8799>.
And the serpent <WH5175> said <WH559> <WH8799> unto the woman <WH802>, Ye shall not surely <WH4191> <WH8800> die <WH4191> <WH8799>:

For 'Elohim <WH430> doth know <WH3045> <WH8802> that in the day <WH3117> ye eat <WH398> <WH8800> thereof, then your eyes <WH5869> shall be opened <WH6491> <WH8738>, and ye shall be as 'elohim <WH430>, knowing <WH3045> <WH8802> good <WH2896> and evil <WH7451>.

And when the woman <WH802> saw <WH7200> <WH8799> that the tree <WH6086> was good <WH2896> for food <WH3978>, and that it <WH1931> was pleasant <WH8378> to the eyes <WH5869>, and a tree <WH6086> to be desired <WH2530> <WH8737> to make one wise <WH7919> <WH8687>, she took <WH3947> <WH8799> of the fruit thereof <WH6529>, and did eat <WH398> <WH8799>, and gave <WH5414> <WH8799> also <WH1571> unto her husband <WH376> with her; and he did eat <WH398> <WH8799>.

And the eyes <WH5869> of them both <WH8147> were opened <WH6491> <WH8735>, and they <WH1992> knew <WH3045> <WH8799> that they were naked <WH5903>; and they sewed <WH8609> fig <WH8384> leaves <WH5929> together <WH8609> <WH8799>, and made themselves <WH6213> <WH8799> aprons <WH2290>.

And they heard <WH8085> <WH8799> the voice <WH6963> of the YY <WH3068> 'Elohim <WH430> walking <WH1980> <WH8693> in the garden <WH1588> in the cool <WH7307> of the day <WH3117>: and Adam <WH120> and his wife <WH802> hid themselves <WH2244> <WH8691> from the presence <WH6440> of the YY <WH3068> 'Elohim <WH430> amongst <WH8432> the trees <WH6086> of the garden <WH1588>.
And the YY <WH3068> 'Elohim <WH430> called <WH7121> <WH8799> unto Adam <WH120>, and said <WH559> <WH8799> unto him, Where art thou <WH335> ?

And he said <WH559> <WH8799>, I heard <WH8085> <WH8804> thy voice <WH6963> in the garden <WH1588>, and I was afraid <WH3372> <WH8799>, because I <WH595> was naked <WH5903>; and I hid myself <WH2244> <WH8735>.

And he said <WH559> <WH8799>, Who <WH4310> told <WH5046> <WH8689> thee that thou wast naked <WH5903>? Hast thou eaten <WH398> <WH8804> of the tree <WH6086>, whereof I commanded thee <WH6680> <WH8765> that thou shouldest not <WH1115> eat <WH398> <WH8800> ?

And the man <WH120> said <WH559> <WH8799>, The woman <WH802> whom thou gavest <WH5414> <WH8804> to be with me <WH5978>, she <WH1931> gave <WH5414> <WH8804> me of the tree <WH6086>, and I did eat <WH398> <WH8799>.

And the YY <WH3068> 'Elohim <WH430> said <WH559> <WH8799> unto the woman <WH802>, What is this that thou hast done <WH6213> <WH8804>? And the woman <WH802> said <WH559> <WH8799>, The serpent <WH5175> beguiled me <WH5377> <WH8689>, and I did eat <WH398> <WH8799>.

And the YY <WH3068> 'Elohim <WH430> said <WH559> <WH8799> unto the serpent <WH5175>, Because thou <WH859> hast done <WH6213> <WH8804> this, thou art cursed <WH779> <WH8803> above all cattle <WH929>, and above every beast <WH2416> of the field <WH7704>; upon thy belly <WH1512> shalt thou go <WH3212> <WH8799>, and dust <WH6083> shalt thou eat <WH398> <WH8799> all the days <WH3117> of thy life <WH2416>:

And I will put <WH7896> <WH8799> enmity <WH342> between thee and the woman <WH802>, and between thy seed <WH2233> and her seed <WH2233>; it shall bruise <WH7779> <WH8799> thy head <WH7218>, and thou shalt bruise <WH7779> <WH8799> his heel <WH6119>.

Unto the woman <WH802> he said <WH559> <WH8804>, I will greatly <WH7235> <WH8687> multiply <WH7235> <WH8686> thy sorrow <WH6093> and thy conception <WH2032>; in sorrow <WH6089> thou shalt bring forth <WH3205> <WH8799> children <WH1121>; and thy desire <WH8669> shall be to thy husband <WH376>, and he shall rule <WH4910> <WH8799> over thee.

And unto Adam <WH121> he said <WH559> <WH8804>, Because thou hast hearkened <WH8085> <WH8804> unto the voice <WH6963> of thy wife <WH802>, and hast eaten <WH398> <WH8799> of the tree <WH6086>, of which <WH834> I commanded thee <WH6680> <WH8765>, saying <WH559> <WH8800>, Thou shalt not eat <WH398> <WH8799> of it: cursed <WH779> <WH8803> is the ground <WH127> for thy sake; in sorrow <WH6093> shalt thou eat <WH398> <WH8799> of it all <WH3605> the days <WH3117> of thy life <WH2416>;
Tshofars also <WH6975> and thistles <WH1863> shall it bring forth <WH6779> <WH8686> to thee; and thou shalt eat <WH398> <WH8804> the herb <WH6212> of the field <WH7704>;

In the sweat <WH2188> of thy face <WH639> shalt thou eat <WH398> <WH8799> bread <WH3899>, till <WH5704> thou return <WH7725> <WH8800> unto the ground <WH127>; for out of it wast thou taken <WH3947> <WH8795>: for dust <WH6083> thou <WH859> art, and unto dust <WH6083> shalt thou return <WH7725> <WH8799>.
And Adam <WH120> called <WH7121> <WH8799> his wife's <WH802> name <WH8034> Havah <WH2332>; because she was the mother <WH517> of all living <WH2416>.
Unto Adam <WH120> also and to his wife <WH802> did the YY <WH3068> 'Elohim <WH430> make <WH6213> <WH8799> coats <WH3801> of skins <WH5785>, and clothed them <WH3847> <WH8686>.

And the YY <WH3068> 'Elohim <WH430> said <WH559> <WH8799>, Behold <WH2005>, the man <WH120> is become as one <WH259> of us, to know <WH3045> <WH8800> good <WH2896> and evil <WH7451>: and now, lest he put forth <WH7971> <WH8799> his hand <WH3027>, and take <WH3947> <WH8804> also of the tree <WH6086> of life <WH2416>, and eat <WH398> <WH8804>, and live <WH2425> <WH8804> for ever <WH5769>:

Therefore the YY <WH3068> 'Elohim <WH430> sent him forth <WH7971> <WH8762> from the garden <WH1588> of Eden <WH5731>, to till <WH5647> <WH8800> the ground <WH127> from whence he was taken <WH3947> <WH8795>.

So he drove out <WH1644> <WH8762> the man <WH120>; and he placed <WH7931> <WH8686> at the east <WH6924> of the garden <WH1588> of Eden <WH5731> Keruvs <WH3742>, and a flaming <WH3858> sword <WH2719> which turned every way <WH2015> <WH8693>, to keep <WH8104> <WH8800> the way <WH1870> of the tree <WH6086> of life <WH2416>.
